timeline.bodyText: This should obviously be configurable, shouldn't it? Otherwise the switch does not make sense.
timeline.author: holgerhagen

replies.bodyText:
The setGermanPublicHolidaysEnabled() method is public.It is the interface, the customer can use to configure the TaskanaEngineConfiguration with respect to german holidays.
The referenced call simply sets the default to true. Without this call, the default is false.
Since the product is developed and mostly used in Germany, I think that true is the correct default...
replies.author: BerndBreier

timeline.bodyText: We do have TaskanaEngineImpl.runAsAdmin(). Do you think we could reuse this here instead of creating a separate method?
timeline.author: holgerhagen

replies.bodyText: This was my first idea: use InternalTaskanaEngineImpl.runAsAdmin. However, that method is a method on InternalTaskanaEngineImpl and JobRunner  has no access to InternalTaskanaEngineImpl, only to TaskanaEngineImpl.
replies.author: BerndBreier
